PLANET XPA Extreme Pale Ale

Try Our Beer

SCROLL FOR MORE

"Where did we come from?"

Derived from a hoppy place in space, PLANET XPA has helped form the utopian society of Lupulin. The hops harvested here provide the extreme floral fruitiness currently invading your mouth. Rare golden grains make up the terrestrial body while Burt mines produce mineral-rich water, amplifying spicy and bitter notes. Seasons change, but this ale doesn't...SAVE SPACE FOR BEER!

IBU: 58 OG: 1.050
FG: 1.005 ABC: 5.8%
